content:
# An error occurred because I attempted to craft a stone furnace without having enough stones in my inventory. 
# The assertion failed, indicating that I need to gather stones before proceeding.

# Let's gather some stones first. I will locate the nearest stone resource and harvest some.

# 1. Locate the nearest stone resource.
stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)
move_to(stone_position)

# 2. Harvest some stone.
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collecting 10 stones.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
